languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс понижает голос.{/n} "Странно, {name}: архонт бы не упустила возможности возглавить рейд и лично упиваться насилием и болью. Что это? Отвлекающий маневр, пока она занята чем-то другим? Или попытка избавиться от нижестоящего?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс понижает голос.{/n} "Странно, {name}: архонт бы не упустила возможности возглавить рейд и лично упиваться насилием и болью. Что это? Отвлекающий маневр, пока она занята чем-то другим? Или попытка избавиться от нижестоящего?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} "{name}, something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс понижает голос.{/n} "Странно, {name}: архонт бы не упустила возможности возглавить рейд и лично упиваться насилием и болью. Что это? Отвлекающий маневр, пока она занята чем-то другим? Или попытка избавиться от нижестоящего?"

What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

{n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} "{name}, something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

languages.text: {n}海因里希压低了声音。{/n}“{name}，我感觉不太对劲。执政官渴望亲自享受暴力与痛苦，他们绝对不会放弃率军劫掠的机会。她是在密谋什么事情吗？她是在想方设法掩盖她的真实意图吗？还是说，她打算除掉她的下属？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} "{name}, something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希压低了声音。{/n}“{name}，我感觉不太对劲。执政官渴望亲自享受暴力与痛苦，他们绝对不会放弃率军劫掠的机会。她是在密谋什么事情吗？她是在想方设法掩盖她的真实意图吗？还是说，她打算除掉她的下属？”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix baja la voz.{/n} «{name}, algo falla aquí. Ningún Arconte dejaría pasar la oportunidad de liderar una incursión y disfrutar del dolor y la violencia en persona. ¿Qué está planeando? ¿Se trata de una distracción para ocultar sus verdaderas intenciones? ¿Un intento de librarse de su subordinado?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} "{name}, something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix baja la voz.{/n} «{name}, algo falla aquí. Ningún Arconte dejaría pasar la oportunidad de liderar una incursión y disfrutar del dolor y la violencia en persona. ¿Qué está planeando? ¿Se trata de una distracción para ocultar sus verdaderas intenciones? ¿Un intento de librarse de su subordinado?».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは声を落とす。{/n}「{name}、これは何かおかしい。アーコンは襲撃の先陣を切って暴力と苦痛を味わい尽くす機会を逃さない。奴は何を企んでいる？破壊行動の裏に隠れた真の意図がこれか？あるいは、自らの部下を排除しようとした？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} "{name}, something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは声を落とす。{/n}「{name}、これは何かおかしい。アーコンは襲撃の先陣を切って暴力と苦痛を味わい尽くす機会を逃さない。奴は何を企んでいる？破壊行動の裏に隠れた真の意図がこれか？あるいは、自らの部下を排除しようとした？」

languages.text: « {name}, il y a quelque chose d'anormal, {n}déclare Heinrix à voix basse.{/n} Une archonte ne manquerait pas une occasion de donner l'assaut et de savourer la violence en première ligne. Que prépare-t-elle ? S'agit-il d'une distraction visant à masquer ses véritables intentions ? Ou bien cherche-t-elle à se débarrasser de son subalterne ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} "{name}, something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

traits.locale_text: « {name}, il y a quelque chose d'anormal, {n}déclare Heinrix à voix basse.{/n} Une archonte ne manquerait pas une occasion de donner l'assaut et de savourer la violence en première ligne. Que prépare-t-elle ? S'agit-il d'une distraction visant à masquer ses véritables intentions ? Ou bien cherche-t-elle à se débarrasser de son subalterne ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix senkt die Stimme.{/n} "{name}, hier stimmt etwas nicht. Eine Archontin würde nie eine Gelegenheit versäumen, einen Überfall zu leiten und Gewalt und Schmerz selbst zu genießen. Was hat sie vor? Ist das ein Ablenkungsmanöver, um ihre wahren Absichten zu tarnen? Oder ein Versuch, ihren Untergebenen loszuwerden?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} "{name}, something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix senkt die Stimme.{/n} "{name}, hier stimmt etwas nicht. Eine Archontin würde nie eine Gelegenheit versäumen, einen Überfall zu leiten und Gewalt und Schmerz selbst zu genießen. Was hat sie vor? Ist das ein Ablenkungsmanöver, um ihre wahren Absichten zu tarnen? Oder ein Versuch, ihren Untergebenen loszuwerden?"

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} ", something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "{name}, bu işte bir bityeniği var. Arkonlar hiçbir koşulda akınlara liderlik edip vahşet ve ızdırap içinde keyif çatma fırsatını geri tepmez. Acaba ne planlıyor? Asıl niyetini gizlemek için dikkat mi dağıtmaya çalışıyor? Yoksa astından mı kurtulma çabası içinde?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lowers his voice.{/n} "{name}, something isn't right here. An Archon wouldn't miss an opportunity to lead a raid and revel in the violence and pain herself. What is she planning? Is this a distraction to mask her true intentions? Or an attempt to get rid of her subordinate?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "{name}, bu işte bir bit yeniği var. Arkonlar hiçbir koşulda akınlara liderlik edip vahşet ve ızdırap içinde keyif çatma fırsatını geri tepmez. Acaba ne planlıyor? Asıl niyetini gizlemek için dikkat mi dağıtmaya çalışıyor? Yoksa astından mı kurtulma çabası içinde?"
